元.definition: currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan); (bound form) first; original; primary; (bound form) basic; fundamental; (bound form) constituent; part; (prefix) meta-; (math.) argument; variable; era (of a reign); (Tw) (geology) eon

元世祖.definition: lit. progenitor of the Yuan Dynasty (1279-1368), title of Khubilai Khan (1215-1294), first Yuan dynasty emperor, reigned 1260-1294

元來.definition: variant of 原來|原来[yuan2 lai2]

元元本本.definition: variant of 原原本本[yuan2 yuan2 ben3 ben3]

元勛.definition: leading light; founding father; principal proponent; also written 元勳|元勋

元勳.definition: leading light; founding father; principal proponent

元史.definition: History of the Yuan Dynasty, twenty third of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Song Lian 宋濂[Song4 Lian2] in 1370 during the Ming Dynasty, 210 scrolls

元夜.definition: Lantern Festival; night of 15th of first lunar month; see also 元宵[yuan2 xiao1]

元太祖.definition: posthumous title of Genghis Khan 成吉思汗[Cheng2 ji2 si1 han2] (1162-1227)

元好問.definition: Yuan Haowen (1190-1257), famous poet Northern China during the Jin-Yuan transition

元宵.definition: Lantern Festival; night of the 15th of the first lunar month; see also 元夜[yuan2 ye4]; sticky rice dumplings

元宵節.definition: Lantern Festival, the final event of the Spring Festival 春節|春节, on 15th of first month of the lunar calendar

元寶.definition: a silver or gold ingot; mock ingot (burnt as offering in worship); a name for ancient currency; a rare genius

元寶區.definition: Yuanbao district of Dandong city 丹東市|丹东市[Dan1 dong1 shi4], Liaoning

元寶山.definition: Yuanbaoshan district, Chifeng city, Inner Mongolia

元寶山區.definition: Yuanbaoshan district, Chifeng city, Inner Mongolia

元山.definition: Wonsan city in Kangweon province 江原道 of North Korea

元山市.definition: Wonsan city in Kangweon province 江原道 of North Korea

元年.definition: first year of an emperor's reign; first year of an era; first year of a significant time period

元曲.definition: Yuan dynasty theater, including poetry, music and comedy

元曲四大家.definition: Four Great Yuan Dramatists, namely: Guan Hanqing 關漢卿|关汉卿[Guan1 Han4 qing1], Zheng Guangzu 鄭光祖|郑光祖[Zheng4 Guang1 zu3], Ma Zhiyuan 馬致遠|马致远[Ma3 Zhi4 yuan3] and Bai Pu 白樸|白朴[Bai2 Pu3]

元月.definition: first month (of either lunar or Western calendars)

元朗.definition: Yuen Long town in northwest New Territories, Hong Kong

元朗市.definition: Yuen Long town, Hong Kong Island

元末.definition: final years of Yuan dynasty (1279-1368); mid 14th century

元末明初.definition: late Yuan and early Ming; mid 14th century

元氏.definition: Yuanshi county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei

元氏縣.definition: Yuanshi county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei

元江哈尼族彝族傣族自治縣.pinyin: Yuan2 jiang1 Ha1 ni2 zu2 Yi2 zu2 Dai3 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
元江哈尼族彝族傣族自治縣.definition: Yuanjiang Hani, Yi and Dai Autonomous County in Yuxi 玉溪市[Yu4xi1 Shi4], Yunnan

元江縣.definition: Yuanjiang Hani, Yi and Dai autonomous county in Yuxi 玉溪[Yu4 xi1], Yunnan

元神.definition: primordial spirit; fundamental essence of life

元素.definition: element (key component of sth); (chemistry) element; (math.) element (member of a set)

元老院.definition: upper house; senate; senior statesmen's assembly

元詩四大家.definition: the four masters of Yuan poetry, namely 虞集[Yu2 Ji2], 範梈|范梈[Fan4 Peng1], 楊載|杨载[Yang2 Zai4] and 揭傒斯[Jie1 Xi1 si1]

元謀.definition: see 元謀縣|元谋县[Yuan2mou2 Xian4]

元謀縣.definition: Yuanmou County in Chuxiong Yi Autonomous Prefecture 楚雄彝族自治州[Chu3xiong2 Yi2zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1], Yunnan

元軍.definition: Mongol army; army of Yuan dynasty

元長.definition: Yuanchang township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan

元長鄉.definition: Yuanchang township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan

元陽.definition: Yuanyang county in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture, Yunnan

元陽縣.definition: Yuanyang county in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture, Yunnan

元音和諧.definition: vowel harmony (in phonetics of Altaic languages)

元龍.definition: one that has achieved the way; emperor
